channel.title: Dj QBA's Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: One of Miami's own takes you on tour.
channel.itunes:author: Dj QBA

item.title: QBA Sessions - No Cheese Please.... Vol 16
item.description: Well the title says it all! 1) Me - Red Flag (Original Mix) 2) Mendo - Inocencia (Original Mix) 3) Shlomi Aber - Create Balance (Steve Lawler Remix) 4) Darran Nugent & Pavel Lenchenko - How Can I (Alexkid Remix) 5) Outstrip - Kindergarten (Original Mix) 6) Stereo Sandwich - Hey Yeah Yeah (Original Mix) 7) Sinisa Tamamovic - Waking Up (Original Mix) 8) Paco Maroto - Baile De Brujos (Original Mix) 9) Wady Uganda_Smilk_s_Bedroom_Mix 10)Paco Maroto,Inaki Santos - Un Dia En La Isla (Original Mix) 11)Stefano Noferini - Fact (Original Mix) 12)Phunk Investigation - Belo Horizonti (Ahmet Sendil Remix) 13)Addy - Inner Voices (Matteo DiMarr Remix)
item.dc:creator: Dj QBA
item.itunes:summary:
Well the title says it all!
1) Me - Red Flag (Original Mix) 2) Mendo - Inocencia (Original Mix) 3) Shlomi Aber - Create Balance (Steve Lawler Remix) 4) Darran Nugent & Pavel Lenchenko - How Can I (Alexkid Remix) 5) Outstrip - Kindergarten (Original Mix) 6) Stereo Sandwich - Hey Yeah Yeah (Original Mix) 7) Sinisa Tamamovic - Waking Up (Original Mix) 8) Paco Maroto - Baile De Brujos (Original Mix) 9) Wady Uganda_Smilk_s_Bedroom_Mix 10)Paco Maroto,Inaki Santos - Un Dia En La Isla (Original Mix) 11)Stefano Noferini - Fact (Original Mix) 12)Phunk Investigation - Belo Horizonti (Ahmet Sendil Remix) 13)Addy - Inner Voices (Matteo DiMarr Remix)

item.title: QBA Sessions - Summer at Space Vol.15
item.description: So on the 30th of July I celebrated my birthday with a set at one of my favorite venues to play in Club Space - Miami. Special thanks to Louis Puig, Emi Guerra and Louis Diaz and all the Space staff for making it a night to remember. To all my friends who were able to make it a big "Thank you" to you all. And to those who couldn't I make this podcast just for you! Track listing to follow later in the week.
item.dc:creator: Dj QBA
item.itunes:summary:
So on the 30th of July I celebrated my birthday with a set at one of my favorite venues to play in Club Space - Miami. Special thanks to Louis Puig, Emi Guerra and Louis Diaz and all the Space staff for making it a night to remember. To all my friends who were able to make it a big "Thank you" to you all. And to those who couldn't I make this podcast just for you!
Track listing to follow later in the week.

item.title: QBA Sessions - Just an Illusion Vol. 14
item.description: Hey everyone summer is almost here and time to have fun with family and friends! Hope you enjoy this extended podcast and once again, thank you all for your great support! Track listing below 1)Kaiserdisco - Lurin (Original Mix) 2)David Herrero - Vibern (Original Mix) 3)Charlie Solana & Adri - No Señor! (Original Mix) 4)Adele - Rolling In The Deep (QBA Grooveboot) . 5)Lookback - Musika (Original Mix) 6)Long_Legs_Running_2011_Graham_Sahara___Central_Avenue_Mix. 7)Channing - You've Got Me Out - Marco LYS Dub Mix 8)Muzzaik, Zaida - Work It (David Penn Remix) 9)Ticon - Balkan Tourist (Paul Thomas & Myke Smith Remix) 10)Alex Kenji, Starkillers, Nadia Ali - Pressure (Rene Amesz Remix) 11)Funkerman - Speed Up (Incognet Remix) 12)QBA- Fuckin VS Shake That Ass Vs QBA Tribal Bootleg 13)Robbie Rivera feat Ana Criado -The_Sound_Of_The_Times_Juicy_Mix 14)Fuzzy Hair - In_The_End_Reza_Remix 15)MYNC - Something On Your Mind Feat Abigail Bailey__Lunde Bros Remix 16)Nadia Ali - At The End (Hardwell Extended Mix) 17)Axwell & Ingrosso vs Chuckie & Klosman - Together (Gregori Klosman Bootleg) 18)DJ Fist, The Bass Kidz - Sortilege (Soulgangsters Remix) 19)Afrojack & Quintino - Selecta (Original Mix) 20)Laidback Luke & Steve Aoki feat. Lil Jon - Turbulence (Tocadisco Remix) 21)Umek, Tomy DeClerque - Original Challenge (Original Mix) 22)QBA- Seal vs Starkillers vs QBA Remake Edit

item.title: QBA Sessions - Bright Lights Vol. 13
item.description: Hey guys this is Part 1 of my May Podcast Enjoy! 1)Wake_Up_feat__Naan_Morgan_Page_Remix 2)Deep Dish - Say Hello - (QBA Goove Mash 2011) 3)John Dahlback- Pyramid QBA's vs Dirty South Booty Tech rmx 4)Sharam- Fun_Marco_Lys_Remix 5)Prok & Fitch- Cabala_Alex_Kenji_Dub_Mix 6)Tune Brothers- Hello_Friday_Original_Mix 7)Ivan The Muru, Jose De Mara- People_Original_Mix 8)Jason Chance- On_And_On_Vocal_Mix 9)Chris Montana, Etienne Ozborne- El_Hacha_2011_Less_Vox_Edit 10)Mark Ivan - Insert Anthem Here (Acetate Test) 11)David Amo, Julio Navas, Manuel De La Mare- Mediterraneo_Original_Mix 12)Martin Solveig & Dragonette - Hello vs Southside (QBA & Charlie Solana Tribal Beat Edit)

item.title: QBA Sessions - Weekend Weapons Part 2 Spring Edition Vol. 12
item.description: Well after an awesome WMC amd MMC I finally found the time to finish the second edition of this series. I hope you all enjoy it! And don't forget to visit www.weekendweapons.com to stay up to date with all the latest releases and news! Track List 1)Chris Lake-Secrets In The Dark - Original Mix 2)Rich Glor-It's a Fine Day (QBA & Manny Cabrera Miami Mix)3)Bastian Van Shield-4)King Of My Castle (Original Mix)5)Wow & Flute-Welcome To The Jungle - Mario Ochoa Remix)6)Paul Strive-Wants To - Original Mix)7)Diego Palacio-Hamelen - Original Mix 8)DJ Ortzy-Yelembe Yelembe - Vlada Asanin & D-blaster Remix 9)Alex Gomez-Circulo Vicioso - Original Mix 10)Etienne Ozborne-Sweet Sensation - Original Mix 11)Jose De Mara, Javi Colina-Daiquiri - Original Mix 12)Mastiksoul-La Sucia Pimp Mix - Original Mix 13)Jose Nunez, Antranig-Are You Ready? - Original Mix 14)Cubetronix-Muzik - The Cube Guys Mix 15)Prok & Fitch-Cabala - Original Mix)16)Mike Vale-Rising Up - Original Mix 17)Alex Kenji, Federico Scavo - Gimme Five (Mix 1)18)Mac Zimms-My Feelings - Original Mix 19)Nobody feat. Imaani - Warehouse Dub 20)Diddy - Dirty-Money-Coming Home feat. Skylar Grey - Dirty South Remix

item.title: Urban Sunset Vol 9
item.description: So this is a groovin set that has a lot of funky beats and just feel good music. Hope you all enjoy it as much I did. Track listing 1. Jaidene Veda, Osaze - Sunday (Jimpster Remix) 2. Little Nancy, Swared, Shelbylove - Black Baron (DJ Simi Remix) 3. Thyladomid - The Voice (Original Mix) 4. Dub Makers - Turn Off (Original Mix) 5. Tomcraft - Room 414 (Can't Get Away) (Tube, Berger Remix) 6. Sami Wentz - Keep That Groove (Original Mix) 7. Booka Shade - Teenage Spaceman (Booka In Space Mix) 8. Numbers - Freak Out (Original Mix) 9. Zombie Disco Squad - Zimbo (Original Mix) 10.Taito Tikaro, J.Louis, Ferran - Keep Me Hangin' On (Javi Reina Remix) 11.Butch - XTC (Riva Starr Cut) 12.Sultan, Ned Shepard, Maher Daniel - Pink Panther (Alex Kenji Remix) 13.Damon Jee - Shimo (Original Mix) 14.DJ Smilk - Were Go Me (Original Mix) 15.Goldfrapp - Believer (Joris Voorn Remix) 16.Inaki Santos, Eros Molina - Tube Tech (Paco Maroto Remix) 17.Union Jackers (Filthy Rich, Jonathan Ulysses, Prok, Fitch) - Yambo (Original Club Mix) 18.Inaki Santos - The Flute Of Your Dreams (Original Mix) 19.LA Riots - Bombah (Mowgli Remix) 20.James Talk, Ridney - Forever (Ramon Tapia Remix)

item.title: Parantula - Miami To Pereira
item.description: As alway we had a great time in Colombia. Bogota was a blast and Pereira once again stole our hearts! So till next time! 1) Miguel Picasso, Rebeka Brown - Show Me Your Love feat Rebeka Brown (DJ Wady Bedroom Mix) 2) Danny Freakx, Strobe - How Long Can I Wait For You - Original Mix 3) Sam La More - I Wish It Could Last (MYNC Bang The Drum Remix) 4) Abigail Bailey, Third Party - Rise - Main Room Mix 5) DJ Boris - Feel It - Abel Ramos Manhattan With Love Mix 6) Roger Sanchez Ì 2Gether (Vanshock & Andrea Bertolini Remix) 7) Dave Aude - Dancin Circles (Stefano Noferini Remix) 8) Fedde Le Grand & Nicky Romero & Prodigy - Smack My Bitch High (Sean Garnier Rockin' Bootleg) 9) Dido - Everything To Lose (ATFC Remix) 10)Underworld - Always Loved A Film (Michael Woods Remix)
item.dc:creator: Dj QBA
item.itunes:summary:
As alway we had a great time in Colombia. Bogota was a blast and Pereira once again stole our hearts! So till next time!
1) Miguel Picasso, Rebeka Brown - Show Me Your Love feat Rebeka Brown (DJ Wady Bedroom Mix) 2) Danny Freakx, Strobe - How Long Can I Wait For You - Original Mix 3) Sam La More - I Wish It Could Last (MYNC Bang The Drum Remix) 4) Abigail Bailey, Third Party - Rise - Main Room Mix 5) DJ Boris - Feel It - Abel Ramos Manhattan With Love Mix 6) Roger Sanchez Ì 2Gether (Vanshock & Andrea Bertolini Remix) 7) Dave Aude - Dancin Circles (Stefano Noferini Remix) 8) Fedde Le Grand & Nicky Romero & Prodigy - Smack My Bitch High (Sean Garnier Rockin' Bootleg) 9) Dido - Everything To Lose (ATFC Remix) 10)Underworld - Always Loved A Film (Michael Woods Remix)

item.title: QBA Sessions Vol. 7 - Sweet Chill
item.description: Uplifting Progressive House 1.Ian Pooley, Analog People In A Digital World - Vega (Ian Pooley Mix) 2.The Believers - Who Dares To Believe In Me (Martijn Ten Velden Remix) 3.Matan Caspi - Off The Lip (Audio Junkies Remix) 4.Charlie And I - Grapefruit & Strawberries (Thomas Sagstad Remix) 5.Nick Bridges - Underneath My Skin (Lissat, Voltaxx Remix) 6.Tom Neville & Stafford Brothers - Come My Way (Original Club Mix) 7.Dj Rap - Give It All Away (Sultan & Ned Shepard Remix) 8.Dirty South - Sweet Disposition (Morgan Page Full Vox Mix) 9.Johnny Krazy - Progress (Original Mix) 10.Eric Prydz feat Adeva - In & Out (Eric Prydz Remix) 11.Julie Thompson - What Will I Do (Club Mix) 12.Shipstad & Warren - Are You With Me (Original Mix) 13.Cloudivers - Breathing Sun (Original Mix)

item.title: QBA Sessions Vol 6 - Into the Dark Side
item.description: Darker than usual but very much fun none the less, daywalkers..lol 1.Christian Davies - The Bends (Alex Kenji Remix) 2.Serge Devant Feat Nadia Ali - 12 Wives In Tehran (Zoltan Kontes Vs Jerome Robins Remix) 3.Mark Trophy - Musika - Original Mix 4.Alex Di Stefano - New Order (Andrea Bertolini Remix) 5.Adam K, Gabe - The Mask (D-Nox & Beckers Remix) 6.Dub Makers, Freeker5 - Pako Pako (Original Mix) 7.Dirty Shake feat. Soraya Vivian - Phunk Investigation Mix 8.Deepswing - In The Music (Nari, Milani Night Mix) 9.Marc DePulse - El Lobo Loco (Koen Groeneveld Remix) 10.D-Unity - Shaman (Tek Diluxe Remix).mp3 11.Strobe (Michael Woods Remix) 12.Jerome Isma-Ae - Hold That Sucker Down (Original Mix)
